#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
 
int next_int()
{
 int n = 0;
char c = getchar_unlocked();
 while (!('0' <= c && c <= '9'))
 {
 c = getchar_unlocked();
  }
  while ('0' <= c && c <= '9')
 {
  n = n * 10 + c - '0';
  c = getchar_unlocked();
}
 return n;
 }
 
int main()
{
int t;
t=next_int();
while(t--)
{
long long int n,temp,ans,sum=0;
n=next_int();
if(n>23)
{
printf("8388607\n");
}
else
{
while(n)
{
temp=n*(n+1);
temp=temp/2;
ans=temp*pow(2,n-1);
ans=ans%8388608;
sum=sum+ans;
n--;
}
sum=sum%8388608;
printf("%lld\n",sum);
}
}
return 0;
}
